resources.string: This app is used to create a system to manage all the operations associated with a Hospital. The different modules covered in this app are :
Staff members, and admin which will control all the core tasks.
details, bills, appointments with doctor, reports
which will control all the core management tasks.

Doctors need to add the Specialization and the preferred tme slot for the first time in order to get the appointments from patients, it\'s the mandatory step without which the doctors can\'t be shown in the appointments list
patient will get the option to get an appointment with doctor, if the doctors add their time slot, from there they will have option to select preferred time slot for the appointment
